page.title: 09RADFORD PARK AND HOOE LAKE
page.content: Over the past few years the Radford Park and Hooe lake{preservation society has been campaigning to prevent the development of an old quarry ,owned by English China Clay, and the lake as a{marina}.A record number of letters of complaint was received by the Planning department.The objections covered a wide number of concerns:greater noise and{pollution}:threat to{wildlife}in Radford and Hooe lakes,particularly to wading birds:added pressure on this green site:disruption to services:increase in traffic.Many hope that the proposed marina will bring much-needed{employment}and will tidy up the old wrecks there.Three stormy public meetings later, the issue is still not resolved, and divides the population of Oreston.
